entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets at times mixed with freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
